pages.text: $(li)The Piercing enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:weapons/crossbow)Crossbow$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)Pickarang$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/flamarang)Flamarang$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment allows projectiles to pierce through creatures, that can be used to hit more enemies.
pages.title: Piercing

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_piercing)Ancient Tome (Piercing)$(/l).
